description.ko: 정교하게 커팅된 유리 프리즘을 통해 백색광이 고유의 색상들로 분리되는 순간을 포착하여 빛과 물리학의 조화를 탐구합니다.
description.en: An exploration of light and physics, capturing the moment white light splits into its constituent colors through a precision-cut glass prism.

prompt: Macro photography of a triangular crystal prism resting on a matte white surface, a sharp beam of light passing through, dispersing into a vivid rainbow spectrum, caustic light patterns, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, soft bokeh background, prismatic refraction effects.
